Package: com.aestasit.infrastructure.ssh

[Groovy] Class DefaultSsh

    • com.aestasit.infrastructure.ssh.DefaultSsh

    • Default "static" implementation of SSH DSL to be used inside plain Groovy scripts.

      Authors:
      Andrey Adamovich
